Text: Re EnronOnline CounterpartiesShould I direct Anadarkos initial questions about the ISDA to you they had been directed to Edmund Cooper but we would like to get them online to transact and it sounds like they need the ISDA in place first Thanks Beth Cowan Forwarded by Beth CowanNAEnron on PM From Harry M CT on PM To Beth NRON cc Leslie CT Subject Re EnronOnline Counterparties Beth Don was correct in that I handle matters dealing with physical hydrocarbons However Leslie Hansen of the Legal Department generally handles GTC matters for EOL Please consult with her on the Marathon matter Mark Taylor and his group in the Legal Department handle financial trading and ISDA matters I hope this is helpful Please advise if you have any other questions Beth NRON PM To Harry M CT cc Subject EnronOnline Counterparties Harry I have recently begun working on marketing EnronOnline to the crude customers Don Schroeder told me you were the attorney who works with that desk I have some questions that have arisen that I was hoping you could answer Don said Marathon Ashland Petroleum had some legal issues that were preventing them from trading online and I was hoping you could tell me where they stand or if you have had any conversations with them Also I spoke with Anadarko Petroleum Corporation and they want to do some crude financial deals but do not have an ISDA in place with Enron Capital Trade International which is who he said he understood the contract needed to be in place with because he has some problems with the GTCs does he speak with Edmund Cooper about those problems or should he address his concerns to you Thank You for your help Beth Cowan

Re EnronOnline CounterpartiesShould I direct Anadarkos initial questions about the ISDA to you they had been directed to Edmund Cooper but we would like to get them online to transact and it sounds like they need the ISDA in place first Thanks Beth Cowan Forwarded by Beth CowanNAEnron on PM From Harry M CT on PM To Beth NRON cc Leslie CT Subject Re EnronOnline Counterparties Beth Don was correct in that I handle matters dealing with physical hydrocarbons However Leslie Hansen of the Legal Department generally handles GTC matters for EOL Please consult with her on the Marathon matter Mark Taylor and his group in the Legal Department handle financial trading and ISDA matters I hope this is helpful Please advise if you have any other questions Beth NRON PM To Harry M CT cc Subject EnronOnline Counterparties Harry I have recently begun working on marketing EnronOnline to the crude customers Don Schroeder told me you were the attorney who works with that desk I have some questions that have arisen that I was hoping you could answer Don said Marathon Ashland Petroleum had some legal issues that were preventing them from trading online and I was hoping you could tell me where they stand or if you have had any conversations with them Also I spoke with Anadarko Petroleum Corporation and they want to do some crude financial deals but do not have an ISDA in place with Enron Capital Trade International which is who he said he understood the contract needed to be in place with because he has some problems with the GTCs does he speak with Edmund Cooper about those problems or should he address his concerns to you Thank You for your help Beth Cowan

REI got called in to help Dan on some of these presentations for the last hour Im happy to come whenever is good for you Beth Cowan Enron Freight Markets Phone Fax Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tuesday November AM To Cowan Beth Subject RE can you come right now Original Message From Cowan Beth Sent Tuesday November AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject You said last week that you might make a call Wharton on my behalf and I should stop by sometime this week I was hoping to take you up on your offer and wondered when would be a good time for me to come see you Thank you Beth Beth Cowan Enron Freight Markets Phone Fax

You said last week that you might make a call Wharton on my behalf and I should stop by sometime this week I was hoping to take you up on your offer and wondered when would be a good time for me to come see you Thank you Beth Beth Cowan Enron Freight Markets Phone Fax

Re EnronOnline CounterpartiesSteve Cisco at Anadarko Petroleum Corporation does not have an ISDA in place with ECT International and he has issues with the GTCs on some of the crude products He was initially directed to Edmund Cooper is that the correct contact or would he work with someone in your group he wants to work on it so that he can trade online with us Thanks Beth Cowan Forwarded by Beth CowanNAEnron on PM From Harry M CT on PM To Beth NRON cc Leslie CT Subject Re EnronOnline Counterparties Beth Don was correct in that I handle matters dealing with physical hydrocarbons However Leslie Hansen of the Legal Department generally handles GTC matters for EOL Please consult with her on the Marathon matter Mark Taylor and his group in the Legal Department handle financial trading and ISDA matters I hope this is helpful Please advise if you have any other questions Beth NRON PM To Harry M CT cc Subject EnronOnline Counterparties Harry I have recently begun working on marketing EnronOnline to the crude customers Don Schroeder told me you were the attorney who works with that desk I have some questions that have arisen that I was hoping you could answer Don said Marathon Ashland Petroleum had some legal issues that were preventing them from trading online and I was hoping you could tell me where they stand or if you have had any conversations with them Also I spoke with Anadarko Petroleum Corporation and they want to do some crude financial deals but do not have an ISDA in place with Enron Capital Trade International which is who he said he understood the contract needed to be in place with because he has some problems with the GTCs does he speak with Edmund Cooper about those problems or should he address his concerns to you Thank You for your help Beth Cowan
